mutation{
  publishStory(input: {
    id: "{{ .draft_id }}",
    name: "mystory"
    group: "nada@nav.no",
    teamID: "team-001"
    productAreaID: "Mocked-001"
  }){
    id
    name
    owner{
      group
      teamkatalogenURL
    }
    views{
      ... on StoryViewHeader{
        content
        level
      }
      ... on StoryViewMarkdown{
        content
      }
    }
  }
}

RETURNS

OPTION data.publishStory.id=IGNORE

ENDOPTS
{
  "data": {
    "publishStory": {
      "name": "mystory",
      "owner": {
        "group": "nada@nav.no",
        "teamkatalogenURL": null
      },
      "views": [
        {
          "content": "Header",
          "level": 1
        },
        {
          "content": "Markdown description"
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}

STORE story_id=data.publishStory.id
